title: A Life in Editing (Henshuu to Isshou)
description:
Author and editor, man and woman, a "heart-pounding" story.
In his seventh year as a manga editor, Tateyama became in charge of Yokozawa, the magazine's signature author.
"I'm going to make a big hit!" he said excitedly.
Yokozawa-sensei provoked Tateyama, seduced him, and thenâ€”!?
Author and editor, man and woman. Where's the line? Can you put everything you have into your manga?
A "heart-pounding" story of a successful author x fledgling editor!
author: Hagiwara Asami
